Headline: No trains between Harlem and Ashland/Lake
ShortDescription: Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between Harlem terminal and Ashland/Lake due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between Harlem/Lake and Ashland/Lake due to police activity.

As a result, trains are operating only between 63rd Terminals and Ashland/Lake at this time.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. Shuttle buses are available between Ashland/Lake and Harlem terminal to provide connecting service.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Reroute at Chicago/Hamlin
ShortDescription: 66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via Chicago, Homan, Augusta, Hamlin and Chicago due to, street blockage near Chicago/Hamlin.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Chicago, Homan, Augusta, Hamlin and Chicago due to, street blockage near Chicago/Hamlin.

Allow extra travel time.
